content.title: Development Portal Website
desc: Developed using ASP.NET MVC.

This application gives people the power to search, research and connect directly to new home developments. With this we can search a home development by price, city, neighbourhood, or maintenance fees. We can save these searches and can ask Team to send an alert each time new and relevant information becomes available. There is a communication forum present in the web site which helps the users to get connected and pass information.

content.title: Job Portal Website
desc: Job requirement included writing backend services in c# and writing client side scripts. Web, iOS and Android application for customers in need of service providers for their various household or office needs. If the customer has a requirement, he/she needs to register with the application and post the job. The job will be notified to those Service providers who are within the vicinity where the job is in need.The notified Services providers can either send quotes or even request for meeting. In case they do not need the requirement, they can simply reject the request.If the quote is accepted and the job completed, either users can send in feedback and ratings.
